details.name: ISO 14289-2:2024 - 8.2 Logical structure - 8.2.5.28 Figure - Figure alternative and replacement text

rule.description: A Figure structure element shall have at least one of the following properties: a) an alternate description (Alt property), as specified in ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.9.3; b) a replacement text (ActualText property) that represents the content enclosed by the Figure structure element

error.message: Figure structure element neither has an alternate description nor a replacement text
